product_name: Planet Bike Blaze 180 USB Front Bike Light
long_description: Easy to recharge thanks to an included USB cable, the Blaze 180 USB front bike light offers a 180-lumen beam to illuminate your path and enhance your visibility to oncoming motorists.
short_description: Easy to recharge thanks to an included USB cable, the Blaze 180 USB front bike light offers a 180-lumen beam to illuminate your path and enhance your visibility to oncoming motorists.
